# init(frame:)

**Initializer**

Creates a view that sizes to the specified frame.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency override dynamic init(frame: CGRect)
```

## Parameters

- **frame**: A structure that positions and shapes the view.

## Overview

This property inherits from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView].

The system invokes this initializer if you omit the `arSession` argument to [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureView/init(frame:arSession:)]. RoomPlan creates its own `ARSession` instance, which you can access through the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureView/captureSession] property’s [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession/arSession].

## Creating a room-capture view

- **init(frame:arSession:)**: Creates a room-capture view with the given AR session.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a view by deserializing from the specified coder.
